version_description:
Major update v1.4.0
- New Guild System
- Bug fixes

v1.4.1
- Added chat notification on unread Guild's messages
- Fixed cropped comic images
- Tons of bug fixes

- Added friend invitation to guild feature
- Updated guild weekly score calculation formula
- Fixed guild winner tab showing the wrong result
- Fixed Power Card - Phantom Lurker causing game to crash
- Fixed guild rewards missing notification
- Other bug fixes

- Added Guild Chest
- Added Guild Shop
- Increased Gems' value in Shop
- Optimized game performance
- Bug fixes

v1.5.1
- Fixed missing Guild Chest points
- Fixed some assigned Guild Cards aren't showing in Guild Deck
- Fixed potential game crash when Guild Menu's Back button is clicked
- Guild Chest contributor list will be sorted by member's points contribution

v1.5.0
- Added Guild Chest
- Added Guild Shop
- Increased Gems' value in Shop
- Fixed potential game crash during Planet's screen
- Optimized game performance
- Bug fixes

v1.5.2
- Able to scroll Guild Chest contributor list
- Bug fixes

v1.5.1
- Fixed missing Guild Chest points
- Fixed some assigned Guild Cards aren't showing in Guild Deck
- Fixed potential game crash when Guild Menu's Back button is clicked
- Guild Chest contributor list will be sorted by member's points contribution

v1.5.0
- Added Guild Chest
- Added Guild Shop
- Increased Gems' value in Shop
- Fixed potential game crash during Planet's screen
- Optimized game performance
- Bug fixes

v1.6.0
- Added Expedition feature
- Fixed Power Card Bull Hulk could potentially leads to game crash
- Other bug fixes

v1.6.1
- Added push notification after an expedition is completed
- Improved Guild chat layout
- Fixed Guild chest isn't showing the correct chest type
- Fixed Imbued spark isn't showing the 5th type
- Other bug fixes
- Fixed Bounce Dagger causing the game to behave incorrectly

v2.0 Major Update is Here!

- 3 New Planets have been discovered : Consist of more than 150 levels, with new menacing Robots and brand new tiles to challenge your strategy!
- New card evolution system : Break the limit and further upgrade your cards after reaching card level 20!
- Card runes : Enhance your card stats with runes! Evolve your cards to get runes and extra rune slots!
- Bug fixes
- Improved performance

- 3 New Planets have been discovered : Consist of more than 150 levels, with new menacing Robots and brand new tiles to challenge your strategy!
- New card evolution system : Break the limit and further upgrade your cards after reaching card level 20!
- Card runes : Enhance your card stats with runes! Evolve your cards to get runes and extra rune slots!
- Bug fixes
- Improved performance

v2.0.2
- Fixed Alien collides with Air Arrow and bounce back stuck on Robot
- Fixed Bounce Dagger damage calculation error
- Fixed Blade Runner, Spear Runner, and Sawtooth Blaster didn't destroy sealed tile

- Fixed Quadruple potentially causes the game to crash
- Other bug fixes
- Level difficulty readjustment

v2.0 Major Update is Here!
- 3 New Planets have been discovered : Consist of more than 150 levels, with new menacing Robots and brand new tiles to challenge your strategy!
- New card evolution system : Break the limit and further upgrade your cards after reaching card level 20!
- Card runes : Enhance your card stats with runes! Evolve your cards to get runes and extra rune slots!

- Hatching new Alien won't be getting Alien which has achieved Rank 10 anymore.
- Other bug fixes.

Holiday season is here!
We've prepared a special event with ton of rewards waiting for you.

Holiday season is here!
We've prepared a special event with ton of rewards waiting for you.
Event starts on Dec 6th, 12AM GMT

Holiday season is here!
We've prepared a special event with ton of rewards waiting for you.

- Fixed Guild's rewards not appearing issue

- Added new languages: Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, and Korean
- Performance improvement
- Bug fixes

v2.4.0
- Lunar New Year Invasion (2018/2/10, 00:00 UTC): The Robots are stealing our Red Packets! Save our fortune by getting the Red Packets back now!
- Added support for iPhone X resolution
- Updated Japanese font style
- Bug fixes
- Performance improvement
